divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my patio deck having a smoke and looking up at the stars. I noticed an object moving through the stars that I thought was a sattelite at first. It was a little bit brighter and it had no tail like a comet would. It was moving very strangley. It would pulse forward a very noticeable distantce instantly. I watched this small, star-like object pulse more frequently until there was a sudden, giant, bright light like an explosion and it was gone. A second later, another of the same sudden explosion type light happened again in the same place in,the sky. I was very much in shock while watching this and I had a feeling come over me that I have never felt before. Its hard to explain. I have never seen anything like that in my life. I felt comforted, if that makes sense to anyone.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around June 2nd 2011
Summary: Star-like ufo pusling forward through the stars instantly then disappears following a giant, bright, sudden flash follwed by another flash,seconds later
